params.text:
• a text file asset, contains some introduction paragraphs for the home page
  • the text can be copied and pasted into the index.html home page file
  • it will probably be tagged with <p>
  • <h1> and <h3> heading labels can be added to help with information architecture if they are not already in the file

• this is an image (photo) asset
  • the name of the file should be included on a wireframe for the page where it will appear
  • the wireframe will state the height and width dimensions

• the filename stir-fryingredients.txt has the file extension .txt
  • .txt usually means that the file conatins simple unformatted text, created with a text editor
  • many programs will open a .txt file so this is a useful format to use for a text asset
  • an alternative way to supply text assets is using a word-processing application like MS Word (.docx)

• this image asset is a graphic in .png (portable network graphc) format
  • the size of the file is 96 KB (kilobytes)

hotspots.header: image asset with .png file type extension

params.text:
• all the text assets have been organised into a folder
  • grouping assets by type can make them easier to manage
